thread.title: SEE IT: Jimmy Kimmel invites ‘fans’ from tour bus into
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Jimmy Kimmel invites ‘fans’ from tour bus into Oscars - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: SEE IT: Jimmy Kimmel invites ‘fans’ from tour bus into
text:
The Oscars were so inclusive that even civilians were invited to the award show Sunday night.
A group of random fans from a tour bus wandered into the Dolby Theatre after host Jimmy Kimmel rerouted them.
“One the count of three, we’ll turn the lights on and everybody yell Mahershala Ali,’ okay?” Kimmel instructed as the group stepped out of the hallway.
The small group, armed with selfie sticks, greeted the famous attendees.
Jimmy Kimmel takes jabs at Trump during Oscars monologue 
Fans from a Hollywood tour bus were allowed to mingle with the celebrities at the Oscars Sunday night. (ABC) One lucky fan took a selfie with “Fences” star Denzel Washington, who pretended to marry the man and his girlfriend.
Others were shuffled down the front of the stage to touch Ali’s Oscar statue.
“Next up is Jason Bateman’s house,” Kimmel joked.
Tags: jimmy kimmel oscars denzel washington jason bateman
